GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.39 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
wifi: iwlegacy: 4965: fix potential off-by-one overflow in il4965_rs_fill_link_cmd()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit b7c39b1a3d4b8d2ba8c13d5ae1303705b03b46d4, it was introduced in version v2.6.39 by commit aa833c4b1a928b8d3c4fcc2faaa0d6b81ea02b56. For more details please see the references link.
